post.text: At Monday's debate, Trump denied saying a lot of the things he's said. Let's set the record straight.

comment.author: Justin
comment.text: Trump was not in public service at the time the war in Iraq came up for a vote, but you were and you voted for it. What Trump thought about the war in Iraq has absolutely no bearing on anything, but your vote does!

replies.author: Lauren
replies.text: Yep. And Trump said repeatedly he was against it to both cavuto and hannity

replies.author: Donovan
replies.text: Oh yes. Let's all blame HILLARY for voting on something based on the lies of Cheney and Bush. Her only crime in that situation was believing false claims made by the administration in charge at that time. And for the record: BERNIE voted for it too - for the same reasons.
